mapper.select: SELECT p.seq, p.title, p.content, p.view_count, p.created_at, u.user_seq, u.email as user_email, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.created_at as user_created_at, u.updated_at as user_updated_at FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.user_seq = u.user_seq ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.seq, p.title, p.content, p.view_count, p.created_at, u.user_seq, u.email as user_email, u.nickname as user_nickname, u.created_at as user_created_at, u.updated_at as user_updated_at FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE p.seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (title, content, user_seq, view_count, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{author.userSeq}, 0, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE posts SET view_count = view_count + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE seq = #{seq}
